short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text to Morse code with style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
9M2PJU Text to Morse Code Converter is a simple and efficient Chrome extension designed to help you instantly convert text into Morse code. Whether you're an amateur radio enthusiast, a learner, or just curious about Morse code, this extension provides a user-friendly and modern interface to easily convert text to Morse code with a single click.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju 

Key Features:
Instant Conversion: Convert any text to Morse code in real-time as you type.
Customizable Spacing: Separates words with a / for clear readability in Morse code.
Modern and Sleek Design: Enjoy a clean and intuitive interface with stylish, fancy colors.
Compact and Lightweight: Easy to use without any unnecessary clutter.

Perfect for those looking to practice Morse code, send secret messages, or explore the world of amateur radio communication.
